Editors note: Before beginning any new exercise program, consult your doctor. Stop immediately if you experience pain.
People often bemoan gray hair and wrinkled skin as some of the most unpleasant … [+5018 chars]

articles.title: Microwaving Plastic Baby Food Containers Releases Micro- and Nanoplastics | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: Just as we understand the impact of calories and nutrients on our health, knowing the extent of plastic particle ingestion is crucial in understanding the potential harm they may cause.
articles.content: Experiments in the lab by researchers from the University of Nebraska-Lincoln showed that microwaving plastic baby food containers can release huge numbers of plastic particles, in some cases, over 2… [+3195 chars]
